description: The videocamera maker GoPro has its IPO today, and it’s the largest IPO by a consumer electronics firm in decades. GoPro is popular among the skateboarder and snowboarder set, but what are its growth opportunities? Nancy Marshall-Genzer takes a look into the future of the business. Then, Tim Stevens, editor at CNET, talks news from the Google I/O conference. Plus Sam Gustin, a Vice correspondent covering technology policy for Motherboard, stops by to discuss the Supreme Court’s Aereo ruling.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, June 26, 2014

Then, Tim Stevens, editor at CNET, talks news from the Google I/O conference. Plus Sam Gustin, a Vice correspondent covering technology policy for Motherboard, stops by to discuss the Supreme Court’s Aereo ruling.
